Module com.example.showSequencerJavafx
Package com.example.showSequencerJavafx

Class CuesManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.showSequencerJavafx.CuesManager
public class CuesManager extends Object
Class to contain and manage all cues

  • Constructor Details

    • CuesManager

      public CuesManager(MainController mainController)
      Cue manager constructor. Sets Variables and gets references to other manager classes
      Parameters:
      mainController - Controller class for main menu

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentCueNum

      public int getCurrentCueNum()
      Getter for Current cue number
      Returns:
      Number of current cue

    • setCurrentCueVolume

      public void setCurrentCueVolume(double volume)
      Setter for master cue volume. Sets all PLAY cues' players volumes according to the input volume and the cues individual volume parameters.
      Parameters:
      volume - Main cue volume

    • getInitialCueVolume

      public double getInitialCueVolume()
      Getter for initial cue volume.
      Returns:
      Master cue volume before any cues are run

    • setInitialCueVolume

      public void setInitialCueVolume(double i)
      Setter for initial cue volume
      Parameters:
      i - Master cue volume before any cues are run

    • getSFXFiles

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<PlaylistFile> getSFXFiles()
      Getter for SFX files
      Returns:
      List of available sound effect playlistFiles

    • getCueClipboard

      public ArrayList<Cue> getCueClipboard()
      Getter for cue clipboard
      Returns:
      List of cues in the clipboard

    • getCues

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Cue> getCues()
      Getter for cues list
      Returns:
      List of all cues

    • setSFXDirectory

      public void setSFXDirectory(File selectedDirectory)
      Setter for SFX directory
      Parameters:
      selectedDirectory - Directory containing SFX files

    • getSFXDirectory

      public File getSFXDirectory()
      Getter for SFX directory
      Returns:
      Directory containing SFX files

    • pasteCue

      public void pasteCue(int selectedIndex)
      Pastes a single cue from the clipboard into the provided index
      Parameters:
      selectedIndex - Index of cue to be replaced with clipboard

    • pasteCueAsNew

      public void pasteCueAsNew(int selectionStart)
      Adds all cues from the clipboard to the cues list starting at the provided index
      Parameters:
      selectionStart - Index to add cues below

    • copyCues

      public void copyCues(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Cue> selectedItems)
      Clears clipboard and adds copies of provided cues to cue clipboard.
      Parameters:
      selectedItems - Items to copy to clipboard

    • addCue

      public void addCue()
      Add new cue with default parameters to cue list

    • removeCue

      public void removeCue(List<Cue> selectedCues)
      Removes all provided cues from the cue list and stops them from playing
      Parameters:
      selectedCues - List of cues to remove

    • next

      public void next()
      Increments current cue number. If on first cue sets the initial cue volume. Runs the cue and sends fader values to faderManger to run. Sets selected to true for the running cue and false for the previous cue.

    • previous

      public void previous()
      Decrements current cue number. If on first cue resets the cues. Backtracks the previous cue and replays the new current cue. Sends fader values found by looking up the last values for each fader in the cue list. Sets selected for current cue and unsets selected for previous cue.

    • getBacktrackFaderDb

      public ArrayList<Double> getBacktrackFaderDb(int currentCueNum)
      Finds most recent fader value from a list of previous cues for each fader.
      Parameters:
      currentCueNum - Index to get previous cues from inclusively
      Returns:
      List of fader values.

    • jumpTo

      public void jumpTo(int selectedIndex)
      Resets cues. After small delay for reset to complete, sets correct master cue volume for new cue index. After small delay for master cue volume to change, run cue and faders.
      Parameters:
      selectedIndex - Index of cue to jump to.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Sets current cue number to -1. Stops all cues. Sets all faders to min. Stops any volume fades and fades master cue volume to initial cue volume.

    • stop

      public void stop(double duration)
      Fades all cues in cue list and pauses the playlist in a given time.
      Parameters:
      duration - Time to perform fades
